alert.note: Alert for Inland Onslow; Jones (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 1:17PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Jones and northern Onslow Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Richlands South, or near Half Moon, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Half Moon, Richlands, Maysville, Catherine Lake, Belgrade, Petersburg, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South, Deppe and Loco VFD. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
